welcome_message_body: Welcome to Bangalore, the vibrant and bustling city known for its rich history, beautiful gardens, and delicious cuisine. We hope you enjoy your time here and take the opportunity to explore all that this charming city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Shiro
restaurants.description: Shiro is a japanese restaurant located in Bangalore.
